414890.name: Robotpencil Presents: Process - How to Approach Color Comps
414890.description:
45 minutes

-Hi Res PSD, JPG

-Photoshop Brush, and Gradients.

Will cover basic approach to color comps and filters. This video will teach you how to make an effective and useful set of layers to help you iterate easily when doing color comps. Your speed on lighting will be improved dramatically.

英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
